title: kumbhAbhiSEkam
sahitya:
kumbhAbhiSEkam koLLum kOmaLamE Om ambA madurai mInAkSi jayajaya


anupallavi

  nambum uLLanbrukk-inba nallamudE un pAda kANikkai emmuDal uyir vAzhvE


caraNam    ulagam un kOvil uyirt-toghai mEni uLLam un sannidhi uNmai un pITham
pal kalai azhagun panmaNi aNigaL un paNI nalamE engaL paNbuyar pUjai
paradEvataiyE parishuddhAnanda vara dEvataiyE vAzhiya ninnaruL
